appList.title: Jurassic Dozer
appList.description:
The best Coin Pusher machine in the wild! Are you ready to venture into the wild for an amazing 3D jurassic dozer experience? Coin Party is here with a new fun-filled jungle story for all you coin pusher addicts! With an exciting casino adventure waiting for you, Jurassic Dozer puts hours of fun into your hands.

Kick off your adventure by dropping a constant flow of gold coins onto the dozer to push piles of cash and prizes your way. Engage in wondrous quests full of enjoyment as you unlock more pushing powers that help you carve your own story in the Jurassic world!

Enjoy the complete casino experience with spin wheels and slot machines, all set up in the jungle. Unleash your primal instincts in this exciting jungle adventure story as you spin the Fortune Wheel, use the Party Slots, and make use of the coin pusher to gain fabulous rewards. It’s an all-in-one package!

You can either trade or spend your prize collection in the Quests, where you can unlock even more powerups and magical chips. Don't forget to collect the casino spin tokens and slot gold bars that appear on the dozer table, and spend them on spinning the in-game fortune prize wheel and party slot machine for amazing rewards!

Introducing the Jungle Slots, our slot machine mini-game where you can win even more prizes! Simply place your bet using your Gold Bars and watch as the rolls spin in your favor on the fruit machine. This exciting fun-filled experience will have you glued to your device for hours. Jungle games have never been so much fun!

Coin Party: Jurassic Dozer features:

★ Top-notch 3D graphics for a lively Jungle story experience 
★ Special quests where everything you collect helps unlock upgrades 
★ Fun collectible and tradable prizes that help you advance the game
★ Superb physics, special effects and animations that light up your screen 
★ Magic chips with unique pusher powers that can be upgraded 
★ Party Slots: Our slot machine mini-game to win tons of prizes
★ Spin the Fortune Wheel to win special rewards
★ Compete on leaderboards and unlock achievements
★ Look out for awesome new updates!

Become the ultimate hunter & conquer the jungle in this amazing new coin quest! Carve your own story full of rewards and challenges, and be a part of the best coin dozer game around!

appList.title: Coin Dozer - Free Prizes!
appList.description:
Step right up, ladies and gents, for the virtual version of the addictive arcade coin pusher you’ve spent hours playing at the carnival! One of most-played free games of all time, Coin Dozer puts the fun in your hands. Drop gold coins onto the dozer to push piles of cash and prizes your way—don’t forget the special coins to help you out! Be careful, though: don’t doze your prizes off the sides! Each prize line you complete unlocks a unique bonus to help you get even MORE prizes and coins! That’s not all! Watch for the puzzle pieces! Each piece gets you closer to completing a unique scene, with a special reward when you finish! Unlock them all and try other Game Circus titles to see the whole carnival! If you run out of coins, no worries: more will fill your virtual pockets

- Impressive 3D graphics

- Special coins and prizes
- Multiple puzzles
- Special effects
